views.markdown:
**StealthCam Pro** is a powerful iOS jailbreak tweak that enables discreet video recording with double-tap volume controls. Designed for professional users who need reliable, high-quality recording capabilities.

## ‚ú® Key Features

‚Ä¢ **üéØ Double-tap Control**: Volume down key double-tap to start/stop
‚Ä¢ **üìπ 4K Recording**: Support for 720p to 4K resolution at 30/60fps  
‚Ä¢ **üîÑ Camera Switching**: Front and rear camera support
‚Ä¢ **üé§ Audio Recording**: Optional high-quality audio recording
‚Ä¢ **üåü HDR Support**: High Dynamic Range video recording
‚Ä¢ **üì± Background Mode**: Completely hidden background operation
‚Ä¢ **‚öôÔ∏è Customizable**: Adjustable settings and vibration feedback
‚Ä¢ **üîí Privacy Focused**: No data collection or transmission

## üéØ Perfect for:

‚Ä¢ Security professionals and investigators
‚Ä¢ Journalists and documentarians  
‚Ä¢ Content creators and filmmakers
‚Ä¢ Anyone needing discreet recording capabilities

## üöÄ Easy to Use

1. Install and enable in Settings
2. Double-tap volume down to start recording
3. Double-tap again to stop
4. Find your videos in the default camera roll

No complicated setup required - it just works!

### üîß Bug Fixes & Improvements

‚Ä¢ **Fixed**: System freeze issue with vibration feedback
‚Ä¢ **Improved**: Volume key detection accuracy and reliability
‚Ä¢ **Added**: Proper single-tap handling to prevent accidental triggers
‚Ä¢ **Enhanced**: Debug logging system for better troubleshooting
‚Ä¢ **Stability**: Overall system stability improvements

### üéØ What's Better

This update focuses on stability and user experience. The vibration feedback system has been completely rewritten to prevent system freezes, and volume key detection is now more accurate than ever.

### ‚ú® New Features

‚Ä¢ **Added**: Vibration feedback for recording start/stop events
‚Ä¢ **Implemented**: UIImpactFeedbackGenerator for modern haptic feedback
‚Ä¢ **Enhanced**: Error handling and recovery mechanisms
‚Ä¢ **Improved**: Overall user experience with tactile feedback

### üîß Core Improvements

‚Ä¢ **Fixed**: Volume key detection issues across different iOS versions
‚Ä¢ **Added**: Support for both volume up and volume down key selection
‚Ä¢ **Improved**: Preference handling and settings persistence
‚Ä¢ **Enhanced**: Configuration options for better customization

views.markdown:
### üîß Troubleshooting

**Q: Double-tap not working?**
A: Check if "Use Volume Down Key" is enabled in Settings > StealthCam Pro

**Q: No vibration feedback?**
A: Enable "Vibration Feedback" in settings and ensure system haptics are enabled

**Q: Recording not starting?**
A: Restart SpringBoard and check camera permissions in Privacy settings

**Q: Videos not saving?**
A: Check available storage space and Photos app permissions

### üÜò Still Need Help?

If your issue isn't listed above, please contact us through Telegram or email with:
‚Ä¢ Your iOS version
‚Ä¢ Device model
‚Ä¢ Jailbreak tool used
‚Ä¢ Detailed description of the issue
